CustomField.formula: CASE(Payment_Terms_salesfacing__c, "NET 30 DAYS", "30", "CHARGE CARD", "07", "NO CUST COPY", "N", "SPECIAL REQMT", "S", "COD-COMPANY CHK", "12", "CASH IN ADVANCE", "11", "FAX INVOICE", "FX", "NET 40 DAYS", "40", "NET 45 DAYS", "45", "NET 50 DAYS", "50", "NET 60 DAYS", "60", "NET 75 DAYS", "75", "NET 90 DAYS", "90", "NET 120 DAYS", "96", "2% NET 10 DAYS", "2%", "1% NET 10 DAYS", "09", "CARD PROCESSED", "18", "45 DAYS - NET", "17", "NET 15 DAYS", "16", "PFC/BANKRUPTCY", "15", "**", "13", "SPECIAL TERMS", "08", "DATED DRAFT", "05", "SIGHT DRAFT", "04", "LTR OF CREDIT", "03", "COD-CASH/CERTCK", "02", "30 DAYS NET", "01", "CLAIM FORM", "Z", "SALES TAX DISP", "ST", "MASTER BILLING", "M", "PROFORMA INVC", "F", "CANADIAN $", "C$", "45 DAYS NET", "SD", "360 DAYS NET", "YR", "NET 360 DAYS", "1Y", "BEACON CC", "1B", "2%-30 N45 DAYS", "20", "2% 10 N45 Days", "19", "")
